dc_title_s: Map of the territory of the United States from the Mississippi River to the Pacific Ocean : ordered by Jeff'n Davis, Secretary of War to accompany the reports of the explorations for a railroad route : made in accordance with the 10th & 11th sections of the Army Appropriation Act of March 3rd 1853
dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures.; Shows Indian tribal locations, military posts, and routes and dates of expeditions and surveys.; Includes "Authorities."; "Note" states it is updated to May 1, 1857.|103 x 114 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:3,200,000|General Map Collection
